rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
Suddenly you feel that the tunnel leads slightly down..  The only 
exit is to the west, and it leads down..

rooms.Name: The long tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel.  The tunnel is quite
wide at this point.

rooms.Name: The long tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel.  The tunnel becomes
narrow to the west.

rooms.Name: The long tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel.  The tunnel is quite
narrow at this point.  You notice a small hole leading south.

rooms.Name: The long tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel.  The tunnel starts sloping
down towards the west.

rooms.Name: The golden cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light.  The cave continues to the south and west.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

rooms.Name: The golden cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light.  The cave continues to the south and east, to the north i a narrow
tunnel.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

rooms.Name: The passage
rooms.Description:
You are in a small passage, it leads south, to the west is a golden
cave.

rooms.Name: The golden cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light.  The cave continues to the north and west, east from you there is
a small passage.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

rooms.Name: The golden cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light.  The cave continues to the south, east and north.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

rooms.Name: The hole
rooms.Description:
You are standing by a large hole in the floor; when you look down
into the darkness you feel frightened.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description: You are in a small tunnel, it leads from east to the west.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description: You are in a larger tunnel, it leads from west to east.

rooms.Name: The passage
rooms.Description:
You are in a passage that leads towards the south.  To the east 
you see a tunnel.

rooms.Name: The golden cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light.  The cave continues to the north, to the west you see a dark 
passage.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

rooms.Name: The dark passage
rooms.Description:
You are in a dark passage, that leads east.  In the ceiling you notice
a small hole, just big enough to pass through.

rooms.Name: The passage
rooms.Description:
You are in a passage that leads north-south.  You notice a small
light to the south.

ExtraDescs.Description: Well you can't see where it comes from..

rooms.Name: The secret tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a secret tunnel that leads north, to the south you see
a small chamber.

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room.  The cave continues to the west and south.
To the north a small hole leads to a tunnel.

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room.  The cave continues to the east and south.

rooms.Name: The passage
rooms.Description:
You are in a north-south leading passage.  To the south you see
light.

ExtraDescs.Description: It nearly is enough to light the passage.

rooms.Name: The secret tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a secret tunnel that leads west, you feel evilness
approaching you as you continue west.

rooms.Name: The secret chamber
rooms.Description:
You are in a secret chamber, the room is filled with an evil
feeling.

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room.  The cave continues to the north and west.

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room.  The cave continues to the east and north.
To the west a passage leads north.

rooms.Name: The passage
rooms.Description:
You are in a passage, to the east you see a cave.  Light from the
cave lights up the passage.  To the north the passage leads into
the darkness..

rooms.Name: A steeply sloping tunnel
rooms.Description:
As you enter this portion of the tunnel, you slip and almost fall! Getting
your balance and feeling around with your foot, you determine that this
particular tunnel slopes very sharply, and you will need to take great care
in order to avoid going down the quick way. To the north, the tunnel levels
out, or you may proceed down the slope, deeper into the caves.

rooms.Name: A steeply sloping tunnel
rooms.Description:
Continuing along the treacherous slope, you pause to recover your breath
and get your bearings. Peering into the distance, you think you can make
out some light somewhere at the bottom of the slope, but the top is
completely dark. You may proceed up or down the slope from here.

rooms.Name: A steeply sloping tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the bottom of a steeply sloping tunnel. To the southwest,
the tunnel opens up into an enormous cave, lighted in some fashion by an
open pit in the center. You may investigate this cave, or proceed up the
slope to the darkness beyond.

rooms.Name: Entrance to the enormous cavern
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the entrance to an absolutely enormous cavern, deep in
the heart of Moria. The center of the cavern lies to the south, where you
see a large, circular hole has been cut in the cavern floor. Apparently
some sort of lava or magma lies there, because the cavern is rather warm,
and a dim red light illuminates it. To the northwest, you see the entrance
to a strange-looking tunnel, barely tall enough to walk through. You may
also exit the cavern by going northeast.

rooms.Name: Entrance to a strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the mouth of an odd-looking tunnel. The tunnel is rather
short, just barely tall enough for a human to walk through without stooping.
Listening into the tunnel, you hear a number of odd clicking noises, and you
wonder what could be making them. The tunnel proceeds to the northwest, and
to the southeast lies an enormous lighted cavern.

rooms.Name: A strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are traveling down a strange-looking tunnel that is just barely tall
enough for you to stand upright in. Odd clicking noises seem to be coming
from further down the tunnel, and as you take a breath, you suddenly notice
a strange smell in the air...something that reminds you of cinnamon...

rooms.Name: A strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are still proceeding through the strange tunnel. The smell of cinnamon
is stronger here, and the clicking noises are definitely louder. You strain
your ears trying to identify the noise, but you cannot seem to recall what
it is, though it definitely reminds you of something familiar. Up ahead, to
the northeast, you see a four-way intersection in the tunnel. You may also
head off to the southwest, where you see an enormous lighted cavern not too
far away from where you are.

rooms.Name: Intersection in a strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are at an intersection in the strange tunnel. The clicking noises and
cinnamon smell are both growing more prevalent, but your memory stubbornly
refuses to divulge where you have heard and smelled these things before.
To the northeast and southwest, you see a couple of small offshoots of the
tunnel, more like small caves, and the tunnel continues to the northwest.

rooms.Name: The guard post
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an offshoot of the strange tunnel. Looking around the
cave, you are startled by some movement in the back. Your light source
reflects off of a hard black exoskeleton, and you let out a yelp of horror
when you suddenly remember where you've heard that clicking noise before...

rooms.Name: Food storage area
rooms.Description:
This area contains a number of old-looking leather sacks. As you open one,
from pure curiousity, you gag on the overwhelming smell of cinnamon that
erupts from the bag. Looking inside, you see a number of disgusting-looking
white grubs, squirming around frantically under your light source. You
quickly close the bag and look away.

rooms.Name: A strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
Continuing through the strange tunnel, you are alarmed to notice that the
clicking noises are all around you now. Disturbing. The tunnel proceeds
northwest, or you can go back southeast, where you can still see a glimmer
of light from the enormous cavern.

rooms.Name: A strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are still walking through the strange-looking tunnel. The smell of
cinnamon has waned a bit, but you can still hear the clicking noises. It
dawns on you that they sound rather like insect noises, but from very
large and numerous insects, judging by the sound. You clutch the handle
of your weapon nervously. Up ahead, to the northwest, there is another
four-way intersection, or you can proceed back southeast.

rooms.Name: Intersection in a strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in another intersection in the strange tunnel. Offshoots of the
tunnel lead northeast, where an eerie, flickering blue light relieves the
darkness of the tunnel, and southwest, where the smell of cinnamon is
powerfully evident. The tunnel also continues northwest and southeast.

rooms.Name: Food storage area
rooms.Description:
This room is virtually identical to the one further down the tunnel. A
number of bags here, filled with nasty white grubs that smell strongly of
cinnamon, lie in wait for the hungry mantis warriors. At the thought, your
stomach begins to heave and you quickly turn away. You may never eat again!

rooms.Name: The Loremaster's area
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an offshoot of the very strange tunnel. This place is
very odd-looking, sort of a cross between a mage's laboratory and an
anthive. Numerous small insectoid creatures scurry around in glass bottles,
a large number of vials contain various powders and liquids, and a number
of vellum scrolls are laying around, covered in an exceedingly odd form of
writing. Also, a number of bags smelling strongly of cinnamon are scattered
throughout the room. You feel very uncomfortable standing here, and an
inner voice suggests that leaving would be a very good idea.

rooms.Name: A strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are continuing down the strange-looking tunnel, which leads northwest to
southeast. It is very dark here, but the smell of cinnamon appears to be
fading slowly, though the clicking noises continue full force. To the
southeast is another intersection in the tunnel, and to the northwest the
tunnel continues straight into the darkness.

rooms.Name: A strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a strange tunnel deep underneath the caves of Moria. The
tunnel proceeds northwest and southeast. The ubiquitous clicking noise seems
to be getting louder to the northwest, though it is difficult to be sure in
tunnels such as this one. Far to the southeast, you can still make out a
point of light from the enormous cavern in that direction.

rooms.Name: A strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
The strange tunnel continues to the northwest and southeast. The smell of
cinnamon is definitely reduced here, but the clicking noises are much
louder. Ahead, to the northwest, you spy another intersection in the tunnel.
The way your footsteps echo from the walls makes you think you might be
nearing the end of the tunnel. The thought sounds attractive, actually.

rooms.Name: Intersection in a strange tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are standing at an intersection in the strange tunnel, with offshoots
of the tunnel leading to the northeast and southwest. A very odd smell is
coming from the northeastern area, and the southwestern area seems to be
one of the sources of the noise you have been hearing. The tunnel also
continues to the northwest and southeast.

rooms.Name: A guard post
rooms.Description:
This room appears to be a guard post for the mantis warriors. An odd carving
in the stone wall serves as a weapons rack, and a number of spears and
throwing wedges are lying there. Thri-kreen warriors are much more aggressive
than the average thri-kreen, and you feel anxious to get out of this place
before one of them discovers your intrusion...

rooms.Name: The nursery
rooms.Description:
As soon as you enter this room, you notice that it is noticeably warmer and
moister than the rest of the cave, though how this is accomplished is not
apparent. The reason for it soon becomes obvious, though. Looking around
the room, you see dozens of tiny thri-kreen larvae, carefully being tended
by a number of thri-kreen nurses. The scene makes you feel a sense of
kinship with the alien thri-kreen for the first time you can remember, and
you are reluctant to disturb the thri-kreen in the labors.

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Hivemaster's lair
rooms.Description:
Suddenly, the strange tunnel opens out into a much larger one. The smell of
cinnamon is strong here, and the air seems warmer for some reason. The
tunnel continues to the northwest, and you may also go back southeast.

rooms.Name: Inside the Hivemaster's lair
rooms.Description:
You are definitely in a lair of some sort. The air is growing warmer and
thicker, and the smell of cinnamon is almost overpowering. The widened
tunnel makes a sudden turn to the northeast, and the echoes of your
footsteps tell you that it ends there...

rooms.Name: The breeding chamber
rooms.Description:
The tunnel widens into a full-fledged cave here, and abruptly ends. As you
look around, you see an elaborately furnished room, but quite alien to your
eyes. A great throne of stone, carved with mind-numbingly odd designs, sits
at the back of the cave. Upon this throne sits the king of the thri-kreen,
their Hivemaster. A number of smaller thri-kreen lie around on the floor,
languishing. These are presumably female, but with thri-kreen, who can tell
the difference? All present in the room make alarming clicking noises with
their mandibles as you enter the sacred presence of their Hivemaster. Maybe
that wasn't such a good idea after all...

rooms.Name: The hobgoblin chief's room
rooms.Description:
This room is simply a cave that has been furnished with various sorts of
fiendish torture devices, perfect for hobgoblins. It stinks of fear, blood,
and feces, and you grow uneasy just being here. Suddenly, you hear movement
from further within the room, and your hand goes involuntarily to your
weapon as a grim, alien voice laughs sadistically at you...

rooms.Name: The center of the enormous cavern
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the center of the enormous cavern. Before you, you see a
large hole in the floor, possibly an old mine shaft. It is obvious that if
this was a mine shaft, it has been abandoned long ago. As you look down into
the hole, a blast of raw heat dries your skin. A few hundred feet below you,
a river of lava flows, warming and lighting the entire cavern. You may go
north, south, east, or west from here.

rooms.Name: Northwest corner of the enormous cavern
rooms.Description:
You are in the northwest corner of the enormous lighted cavern. To the east
lies the center of the cavern, where a dim red glow that lights the whole
area comes from a large hole in the floor. The cavern continues to the south,
where you think you spy a tunnel leading out.

rooms.Name: Eastern end of the enormous cavern
rooms.Description:
You are at the eastern end of the enormous lighted cavern. The cavern extends
to the west, where you see a huge crack in the floor, the northwest, where
you see the entrance to the cavern from the sloping tunnel, and the south,
from which a very bad smell is coming.

rooms.Name: Southwest corner of the enormous cavern
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the southwestern corner of the enormous cavern, where a
wide tunnel leads off to the west into total darkness. The cavern also
continues to the north and east from here.

rooms.Name: South end of the enormous cavern
rooms.Description:
You are in the southern portion of the enormous cavern. The cavern continues
to the north, east, and west, and to the south you see a dark tunnel leading
further south. This tunnel, unlike the others, looks as if it has been
worked, and is not natural. However, it is doubtful that humans were involved
in its construction, as it is barely tall enough for a human to walk upright
in. The tunnel is very dark, and you feel wary about investigating.

rooms.Name: Southwest corner of the enormous cavern
rooms.Description:
You are in the southwest corner of the enormous lighted cavern. The cavern
extends to the north and west. To the east, you see a huge tunnel, from
which an absolutely awful smell is coming. You feel dread well up in your
bones as you contemplate progressing in that direction.

rooms.Name: The dropoff
rooms.Description:
You have walked into the tunnel no more than thirty feet when suddenly your
foot finds the edge of a cliff. Stopping in a hurry, you shine your light
source along the area. You appear to be standing on a cliff about sixty or
seventy feet high, leading down into blackness. Straining your eyes, you
see a faint glimmer at the bottom of the cliff. You could probably descend
the cliff without too much trouble, or you can go back east, to the cavern.

rooms.Name: The water-filled cavern
rooms.Description:
You find yourself in a cavern that is almost completely filled with water.
It is so deep that you must swim or tread water in order to make any headway.
You realize that this must have been the glimmer that you saw from the top
of the cliff. Looking around the place, you see that you can either go back
up the cliff, or continue west, further into the water-filled cavern, and
see what can be seen.

rooms.Name: The water-filled cavern
rooms.Description:
Swimming strongly, you continue down the water-filled cavern. The walls of
the cave look very unremarkable, and you find it hard to understand why you
are still here. Still, you have come this far, so perhaps you should keep
going. The cavern leads back to the east, and to the west, you are able to
pick out a huge, rounded cavern, also nearly full of water.

rooms.Name: The huge pool
rooms.Description:
You are in an huge, rounded cavern. You somehow sense that the water is much
deeper here than in the caverns to the east. Perhaps there is a large hole
in the bottom of the cave, which lets the water in. There appears to be a
lot of pale and sickly-looking vegetation covering the walls here, perhaps
washed up from some other source in the caverns. To the east, you may go
back to the water-filled caverns, and to the west you notice a slightly
drier tunnel leading into the darkness.

rooms.Name: The slightly drier tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a slightly narrower tunnel where the water is not quite as high.
You are able to walk here instead of swimming, but progress is pretty slow,
and you are getting tired pretty rapidly. The water rises to about waist
level at some points. To the east, you see a much larger cave with deep
water, that will necessitate a brief swim, and to the west the drier tunnel
continues.

rooms.Name: The slightly drier tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are still slogging along through a tunnel filled waist-deep with water.
The tunnel bends here, turning to the north, or you can go back east.

rooms.Name: The dark, cold tunnel
rooms.Description:
Woah. Suddenly, the tunnel gets very cold, and darker than any tunnel you've
ever encountered before. The water has gotten chillier, too, and you find
yourself shivering and rubbing your hands together. The tunnel continues
to the north, and to the south you see a bend in the tunnel that should take
you back to the warmer caverns.

rooms.Name: The dark, cold tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are a bend in the dark, cold tunnel. To the east, you see a large cave.
You can pick out no details, but your light source reveals that there may
be something moving in there, several somethings in fact. You may also
exit to the south, back toward the warmer tunnels.

rooms.Name: The shrine of the kuo-toa
rooms.Description:
As soon as you enter this area, you realize that it is somewhere you would
rather not be. Dominating the cave is a huge statue made of limestone, of
a stunningly beautiful naked woman with the head of a frightful lobster.
The statue is studded with gemstones, most notably two large emeralds at
the tips of her antennae. Your palms itch with the desire to acquire these
priceless stones, and you fail to notice that this room is occupied...

rooms.Name: Inside the huge, smelly tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are inside the huge, smelly tunnel. The smell is putrid, and overwhelming,
something like rotting flesh. You can barely keep your gorge down as you
walk down the tunnel. You can continue down the tunnel to the northeast, but
perhaps it would be better to go back to the cavern, west of you...

rooms.Name: Inside the huge, smelly tunnel
rooms.Description:
The stench is growing stronger, almost palpable at this point. You have some
serious doubts about your ability to hold your food down. There is a bend in
the tunnel ahead, to the northeast, or you can return to the southwest.

rooms.Name: At a bend in the huge, smelly tunnel
rooms.Description:
As you reach this point in the tunnel, you hear a scraping noise from further
down the tunnel that you cannot identify. It sounded like something very
large, though. A feeling of dread runs up and down your spine. What is in
this tunnel? Why are YOU in this tunnel? You can go 'round the bend to the
southeast and investigate, or turn tail and go back to the southwest.

rooms.Name: Further down the huge, smelly tunnel
rooms.Description:
You have rounded the bend in the huge tunnel and are now staring down a
long, wide tunnel leading south. You hear the scraping noises from further
down the tunnel and your heart skips a beat. Maybe you ought to go back...

rooms.Name: The tunnel widens
rooms.Description:
The tunnel widens a great deal at this point. It is now so large that your
light source cannot illuminate both walls at the same time. The smell seems
to have leveled out a bit, or maybe you are just becoming accustomed to it.
You can continue south, further down the tunnel, or go north, where the
tunnel grows narrower, and bends off.

rooms.Name: The wide, smelly tunnel
rooms.Description:
You hear the scraping noises again, and that is not reassuring. It reminds
you a little bit of huge stones grating together, but there is a stealthy
quality to it as well. You shudder as you contemplate the possiblities, and
grip your weapon tightly. The tunnel continues north and south.

rooms.Name: The wide, smelly tunnel
rooms.Description:
You have discovered the source of the foul smell, and your nausea reasserts
itself with sharp clarity. This portion of the tunnel is simply covered in
various dead and dismembered humanoid bodies. You notice humans, duergar,
gnolls, goblins, and even the occassional elf or dwarf. The stench is
overpowering, and brings tears to your eyes. You notice that the bodies
are piled especially high on the eastern wall, but you are not sure you
have the nerve to investigate further. There is a humungous cavern to the
south, and you hear scraping noises coming from it...

Exits.Description: A large pile of decaying humanoid corpses conceals a tunnel.

rooms.Name: A very narrow tunnel
rooms.Description:
This tunnel has apparently been forgotten by whoever laid the bodies down,
for the dust on the floor has been undisturbed for years. This tunnel is a
lot narrower than the one you just left, and it continues to the east.

Exits.Description: A large pile of decaying humanoid corpses conceals a tunnel.

rooms.Name: The secret chamber
rooms.Description:
The tunnel dead-ends into a small chamber here, and it looks as if it has
been furnished, with alchemical vessels and similar accoutrements of the
practicioners of magic. You wonder what mage would choose to dwell among
the monsters of Moria, but suddenly you catch some movement out of the
corner of your eye, and your question is answered for you...

rooms.Name: The humungous stinking cavern
rooms.Description:
This cavern is incredibly large, definitely the largest you have ever seen,
or even heard of. Your light picks out stalactites that must be sixty feet
long, hanging high above you from the cave ceiling. Suddenly, you hear a
loud scraping noise behind you, and you turn to face a nine-foot dark green
monstrosity with tremendous claws and fangs. You fool! You've wandered into
a lair full of trolls!

rooms.Name: Inside the mineshaft
rooms.Description:
You are inside the tunnel. You notice again that the ceiling is rather low
when you bash your head quite painfully against it trying to straighten up.
Your back is not going to thank you for this excursion, you think, rubbing
your sore head and hunching over. The tunnel resembles a mineshaft, in fact.
It leads to the south, or you can exit the tunnel to the north.

rooms.Name: Inside the mineshaft
rooms.Description:
Continuing down the mineshaft, you notice that the walls here have marks on
them, in some sort of strange characters you've never encountered before.
It looks as if the types of stone in the walls have been categorized and
labeled accordingly. The shaft continues to the north and south. You can
see the enormous lighted cavern to the north.

rooms.Name: Inside the mineshaft
rooms.Description:
Still hobbling painfully down the shaft, you notice that it widens at this
point, and the walls become rougher. Apparently the shaft struck a natural
cavern here, which is being utilized for something. Unfortunately, the
ceiling of the cavern is no higher than that of the shaft. The cavern lies
to the south. You may also continue north, back towards the lighted cave.

rooms.Name: Living quarters
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large cavern deep below the caves of Moria. Your light
source picks out a number of bedrolls, pots, and cooking utensils scattered
across the floor, and a number of sticks of unused firewood. Apparently
some people are using this area for living quarters. And judging by the
lack of cleanliness of all this gear, it is a group of miners. The cavern
continues to the south, west, and east, and to the north you can re-enter
the mineshaft.

rooms.Name: Living quarters
rooms.Description:
You are in the northwest corner of the natural cavern, which extends to the
east and south from here. A number of leather sacks have been scattered
around here, probably to carry wood for the cooking fires.

rooms.Name: Living quarters
rooms.Description:
This is the northeastern corner of the natural cavern. The cavern extends to
the south and west from here. A number of empty barrels have been left here.
From the smell of them, they were once full of some very strong beer.

rooms.Name: Living quarters
rooms.Description:
This is the southwestern corner of the natural cavern, which extends to the
north and east. A number of smelly copper pots are piled in this corner.
You refrain from conjecturing on what they are used for.

rooms.Name: Living quarters
rooms.Description:
You are in the southern portion of the natural cavern. This area seems to
have been left fairly clear of personal effects and other debris. Another
mineshaft leads south out of the cavern, and the cavern continues to the
north, east, and west.

rooms.Name: Living quarters
rooms.Description:
This is the southeast corner of the natural cavern. A number of maps of the
caves have been left here, but all of the writing is in the same sort of
strange characters you saw on the wall of the shaft earlier, and thus they
are completely useless to you. The cave continues to the north and west.

rooms.Name: Inside the mineshaft
rooms.Description:
This mineshaft is no taller than the other, and you are beginning to consider
sitting down for awhile and resting your aching back. However, as you enter
the shaft, you hear noises of clashing metal against rock from further down
the way, and you decide it wouldn't be prudent. The shaft continues to the
south, and to the north you see a large natural cavern.

rooms.Name: Inside the mineshaft
rooms.Description:
The mineshaft bends here, continuing to the west. You can also go north.
More of that odd writing is on the wall here. The metallic noises seem to
be getting louder as well.

rooms.Name: Inside the mineshaft
rooms.Description: Your back is really beginning to kill you.

rooms.Name: Before the cave
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a mineshaft with a low ceiling. Apparently the shaft ran
into another natural cavern here, to the south. A wide arch has been hewn
into the south wall, allowing access to the cavern. Those metallic clashing
noises are definitely louder, but they are coming from the west, where the
mineshaft continues into the darkness, rather than from the south. As you
debate your next move, your light source catches the glint of metal from
inside the cavern to the south. Interesting.

rooms.Name: The equipment room
rooms.Description:
You are in another natural cavern below the caves of Moria. This one has
been discovered and utilized by miners, it seems, since it is full of
mining-related equipment, everything from picks and shovels to a number of
brand-new spirit levels. Pretty unexciting, for the most part. The cavern
continues to the south and east, and to the north you see a mineshaft
leading out of the cavern.

rooms.Name: The equipment room
rooms.Description:
You are in the northeast corner of the cavern. Nothing but mining equipment
and more mining equipment. Looking a bit more closely, you realize that
this stuff was definitely not fashioned for human hands. It is rather small,
but made of some sort of dull, heavy metal. The cavern continues to the
south and west.

rooms.Name: The equipment room
rooms.Description:
You are in the southwest corner of the cavern. This area contains a small
wooden table and a short stool. Upon the table are a thick sheaf of paper,
a number of quill pens, and a couple of bottles of ink. The papers appear
to contain diagrams relating to mining, but since you understand neither
the language they are written in, nor mining, they are useless to you. The
cavern continues to the north and east.

rooms.Name: The equipment room
rooms.Description:
This is the southeastern corner of the large cavern. A number of rocks have
been dropped here, probably samples from various places in the mine. All
you can really tell about them is that they are, in fact, rocks. The large
cavern continues to the north and west.

rooms.Name: Inside the mineshaft
rooms.Description:
This place is definitely beginning to get to you. You now have a headache
to go with your backache, due to the continuous, rhythmic clash of metal
on stone, coming from further down the shaft, which continues east and
west from here.

rooms.Name: Before the main deposit
rooms.Description:
As you enter this portion of the shaft, you feel certain that the noise is
coming from the cavern directly ahead of you, to the west. You get a sudden
urge to pull a weapon and destroy the source of your pounding headache, but
you can still continue east if you decide to restrain yourself.

rooms.Name: The main deposit
rooms.Description:
As you enter this cave, the ringing sound of metal on rock becomes almost
too much to bear. Looking around, you see a large group of short, broad
people chipping away at the stone with picks. They appear to be dwarves,
but they have different complexions from the dwarves you have encountered
before. As your light source illuminates the room, some of them cry out in
pain and drop their tools. At the sound of this, another group of them
decide to rush you. Whoops...

rooms.Name: The main deposit
rooms.Description:
This appears to be the main deposit of whatever metal or mineral these odd-
looking dwarves are searching for. The cave has been greatly enlarged here,
and bulges and curves in odd places, presumably to follow the seam. As you
enter the area, a number of the tough-looking fellows snarl at you and
raise their tools threateningly. Maybe you should leave.

rooms.Name: The main deposit
rooms.Description:
This portion of the cavern looks to have been mined out, as there are no
miners working on it currently, and the cave wall is covered in those odd-
looking markings you have noticed elsewhere. The cavern extends both north
and east, and you see a number of the miners hard at work in both places.

rooms.Name: The main deposit
rooms.Description:
You appear to be in the main deposit of whatever these strange dwarves are
mining. A number of them are hard at work now, their tools clanging against
the wall with a harsh, ringing sound. They do not appear pleased to see you,
and as you eye their massive muscles in their solid frames, you begin to
think that it might be best to indulge them. You can leave to the east,
south, or west.

rooms.Name: A new tunnel
rooms.Description:
It appears that the dwarves have started a new tunnel here, to follow the
seam. A smaller group of miners are hard at work, and a dwarf somewhat larger
than the rest is shouting orders at them in a harsh, guttural language. As
your light source brightens the room, the workers cry out and falter, and
the larger dwarf turns to face you, hate in his pupilless grey eyes...
